name: Kamastrakas Curse
description:
Kamastrakas Curse is a 2-Player-LAN-MultiplayerSteampunk  Space Shoot 'em up where you take control of the spaceship "Nachtwärts" from the book "The Crown of the Stars" by Kai Meyer on a mission to destroy the spawns of the evil Black-Hole-Deity Kamastraka. Work together to shoot as many aliens as possible and don't let them kill you!

General Info:

- 1-2 Players

- linear Standard Mode and endless Survival Mode

- Keyboard (game) and Mouse (menus)

Asset Store Assets used:

- Galaxian Space Invaders

- Astar Pathfinding Project

- Perfect Asteroids

- Volumetric Lines
